scripts.test:chrome: npm run server:start & npx testcafe chrome test || npm run server:stop
scripts.test:chromeheadless: npm run server:start & npx testcafe chrome:headless test || npm run server:stop
scripts.test:ff: npm run server:start & npx testcafe firefox test || npm run server:stop
scripts.test:ffheadless: npm run server:start & npx testcafe firefox:headless test || npm run server:stop
scripts.test:customreport: npm run server:start & npx testcafe chrome test --reporter html:./reports/report_$(date +"%Y-%m-%d_%H-%M-%S").html || npm run server:stop
scripts.test:ghactions: npm run server:start & npx testcafe chrome:headless test || npm run server:stop
